name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForMucocutaneousLymphNodeSyndromeKawasakiDisease
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Mucocutaneous Lymph Node Syndrome (Kawasaki Disease)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome (Kawasaki Disease) and is listed as a rheumatologic/autoimmune/inflammatory condition on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome (Kawasaki Disease).),(Exclusion Criteria: )
